item.title: Trump tariff, valuation woes fail to deter DIIs as inflows into Indian stock market top  ₹5 lakh crore for second year

item.title: Amanta Healthcare IPO: Issue booked 4.6x times on the first day. Check GMP and other details

review.headline_rewrite: Amanta Healthcare IPO: Issue booked 4.6x times on the first day. Check GMP and other details
bullets: Amanta Healthcare IPO: The initial public offering (IPO) of Amanta Healthcare sailed through within hours of opening on the first day of the bidding
The IPO closed the first day with strong demand, largely from retail and non-institutional investors.
Amanta Healthcare IPO closed with 4.61 times subscription as it garnered bids for 3,22,83,629 shares as against 70,00,000 shares on offer.
Amanta Healthcare IPO GMP today is ₹25.

item.title: Q1 GDP surge masks structural disconnects

review.headline_rewrite: Q1 GDP surge masks structural disconnects
bullets: India’s Q1 FY26 GDP print suggests a robust economic expansion, with real expenditure GDP growing by 7.8 per cent year-on-year — well above consensus
Real Gross Value Added (GVA) rose by 7.6 per cent, up from 6.5 per cent, while nominal GDP growth decelerated to 8.8 per cent
This divergence raises critical questions: if GDP growth has been consistently overshooting expectations in Q4 FY25 and Q1 FY26, why did policymakers front-load a
Moreover, the GDP print implies immunity to rising US tariffs — an assertion at odds with growing diplomatic and trade anxieties at the central
